Open 'https://demo.example.com/products/view/PROD-001'

Verify the main product image has source 'product_hero.webp', rendered dimensions 600x400px, natural dimensions 1200x800px, alt text 'Premium Wireless Headphones', loaded within 500ms, and no watermark
Verify the product title 'Premium Wireless Headphones' has font size 32px, text color #222222, font family 'Arial', font weight 700, and is centered
Verify the 'Add to Cart' button is visible, enabled, has background color #007bff, text color #ffffff, border radius 4px, padding 12px 24px, and text 'Add to Cart'
Open 'https://demo.example.com/register'
Verify the 'Username' input field displays placeholder text 'Enter your desired username', has width 300px, height 40px, 1px solid border with color #cccccc, is enabled, and not focused
Verify the 'Username' label has font size 14px, text color #333333, and bottom margin 8px
Click the 'Username' input field
Verify the 'Username' input field is focused and its border color changes to #007bff
Verify the 'Register' button's aria-label is 'Submit new user registration'
Open 'https://demo.example.com/dashboard'
Verify the main navigation bar is visible, positioned at top 0, left 0, and has background color #333333
Verify the 'Dashboard' link is active/selected, has text color #ffffff, font weight 600, padding 15px 20px, x-coordinate 20px, y-coordinate 10px
Verify the logo image has source 'company_logo.svg', rendered dimensions 120x40px, alt text 'Company Logo', is left-aligned within the navigation bar, with 10px right margin
Open 'https://demo.example.com/media/video.html'
Verify the video element has width 800px, height 450px, source 'promo_video.mp4', is initially muted, and fully loads within 2 seconds
Verify the 'Play' button is visible, enabled, has circular shape (border radius 50%), background color rgba(0,0,0,0.7), and aria-label 'Play video'
Click the fullscreen button
Verify the video transitions into fullscreen mode within 300ms
Open 'https://demo.example.com/data-report'
Verify the table displays exactly 10 rows
Verify alternating row background colors are #f9f9f9 and #ffffff
Verify each table cell has padding 8px and 1px solid border with color #dddddd
Verify the 'Next Page' button is enabled, has font size 14px, and text color #007bff
Verify the currently active page number button has background color #007bff and text color #ffffff
Open 'https://demo.example.com/settings'
Trigger the 'Confirm Delete' modal
Verify the modal dialog is visible, centered at x 50% and y 50% of the viewport, has width 500px, height 200px, background color #ffffff, border radius 8px, and opacity 1
Verify the close button ('X') is visible, positioned at top 10px, right 10px, has font size 18px, and text color #666666
Verify the modal content text 'Are you sure you want to delete this item?' has padding 20px, font size 16px, and text align center
Open 'https://demo.example.com/cart'
Verify the cart item list displays 3 items
Verify each cart item's rendered dimensions are 100% width and 120px height
Verify the 'Total Price' text is 'Total: $149.97', has font weight 700, font size 20px, and text color #000000
Verify the 'Proceed to Checkout' button is visible, enabled, has background color #28a745, text color #ffffff, width 200px, height 45px, and top margin 20px
Open 'https://demo.example.com/gallery'
Verify the main image has source 'image_01.jpg', rendered dimensions 800x600px, natural dimensions 1600x1200px, alt text 'Scenic Landscape'
Verify the main image animates to the next image within 500ms via a slide transition
Verify the 'Next' arrow button is visible, enabled, has triangular shape, color #ffffff, and aria-label 'Next image'
Verify there are 5 pagination indicators
Verify the currently active pagination indicator has background color #007bff and border radius 50%
Open 'https://demo.example.com/profile/user123'
Verify the user's avatar image has source 'avatar_user123.png', rendered dimensions 96x96px, alt text 'User Avatar', and border radius 50%
Verify the user's name 'John Doe' is displayed with font size 24px, font weight 700, text color #333333, located at x 120px, y 80px
Verify the email address 'john.doe@example.com' has font size 16px and text color #666666
Open 'https://demo.example.com/settings'
Click the dropdown menu toggle
Verify the toggle button has text 'Settings', width 150px, height 38px, background color #e9ecef, 1px solid border with color #ced4da, and is focused
Verify the dropdown menu items are visible after clicking and transition into view over 200ms
Verify there are exactly 4 dropdown menu items
Verify the 'Profile' menu item has padding 10px 15px, text color #333333
Verify the 'Profile' menu item becomes active/selected on hover with background color #f8f9fa
Open 'https://demo.example.com/search'
Verify the search input field displays placeholder text 'Search for products...', has width 400px, height 42px, border radius 20px, and its value is initially empty
Type 'laptop' into the search input field
Verify the search input field value becomes 'laptop'
Verify the 'Search' button is visible, enabled, has background color #ffc107, text color #343a40, padding 10px 20px, left margin 10px, and font size 16px
Open 'https://demo.example.com/messages'
Trigger a 'New Message' notification banner
Verify the banner is visible, has background color #28a745, text color #ffffff, width 100% of viewport, height 60px, appears at top 0, and slides in with transition duration 300ms
Verify the message text 'You have 1 new message' has font size 16px, font weight 500, and text align center
Verify the 'Dismiss' button is visible, enabled, has text 'Dismiss', font size 14px, text color #ffffff, and is positioned at the banner's right edge
Open 'https://demo.example.com/upload'
Verify the progress bar element has a width that changes from 0% to 100%, background color #007bff, height 8px, border radius 4px, and exhibits smooth animation
Verify the progress label displays text '75% Complete' when progress is 75%, has font size 12px, text color #333333, and text align center
Verify the 'Upload File' button is enabled and has aria-label 'Upload selected file'
Open 'https://demo.example.com/help'
Verify the first accordion header 'What is your return policy?' has font size 18px, background color #f8f9fa, and padding 15px
Click the first accordion header 'What is your return policy?'
Verify the first accordion header 'What is your return policy?' becomes active/selected
Verify its associated content panel becomes visible, expands to height 100px with transition duration 200ms, has padding 20px, and contains text 'Our return policy allows returns within 30 days.'
Open 'https://demo.example.com/contact'
Verify the map area has width 1000px, height 600px, x 100px, y 200px, and allows horizontal and vertical scrolling
Verify exactly 3 location pin icons are visible, each with source 'map_pin.svg', rendered dimensions 24x24px, and alt text 'Location marker'
Verify the 'Zoom In' button is visible, enabled, and has aria-label 'Zoom in on map'
Open 'https://demo.example.com/profile/edit'
Verify the file input field displays label 'Choose File', is enabled, has width 250px, height 38px, and 1px dashed border with color #999999
Verify the status message 'No file chosen' is visible, has text color #6c757d, and font size 14px
Select a file
Verify the status message changes to 'document.pdf'
Verify the progress indicator is visible

Verify the card title 'Total Sales' has font size 18px, font weight 600, and text color #333333
Verify the metric value '1,234,567' has font size 36px and text color #007bff
Open 'https://demo.example.com/home'

Verify the 'Accept' button is visible, enabled, has background color #007bff, text color #ffffff, border radius 4px, and padding 8px 16px
Verify the 'Decline' button is visible, enabled, has background color #6c757d, text color #ffffff, border radius 4px, and padding 8px 16px
